ygData.subject: RE: whoa
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of visual enhancements for higher level weapons (I know this is petty), I would like to see a non wood based handle on the Dark Reaver (always thought
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of visual enhancements for higher level weapons (I know this is
petty), I would like to see a non wood based handle on the Dark Reaver
(always thought the wood handle looked cheesy)... Hmm I wonder what weaps
received an enhancement (Hopefully both the Reaver and FleshRipper)..

Other than that, it looks like a very nice patch indeed. It will be nice to
adjust the clip plane all the way out and I can't wait to hit Kedge Keep
(hmm maybe tonight)..

Enjoy..

Thom



-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 28, 1999 9:30 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] whoa


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

actually, all those changes appear LIVE. now that is what i call one
kick-ass patch!

some very nice stuff in there :)

new models for high level weapons? hmmmmmm ;)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
